titles.title: Honoring Ms. Lois Burton for setting an example for all women through her influence and dedication to the Choctaw Nation and to improved health care and education in honor of Women's History Month.
Honoring Ms. Lois Burton for setting an example for all women through her influence and dedication to the Choctaw Nation and to improved health care and education in honor of Women's History Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Honors Lois Burton, in recognition of Women's History Month, as an extraordinary example for all women.
Commends her for her dedication to the Choctaw Nation and praises her for her advocacy of improved health care and education in Oklahoma.
